item.title: nodejs stream backpressure
item.description: +===================+ x--> Piping functions +--> src.pipe(dest) | x are set up during |===================| x the .pipe method. | Event callbacks | +===============+ x |-------------------| | Your Data | x They exist outside | .on('close', cb) | +=======+=======+ x the data flow, but | .on('data', cb) | | x importantly attach | .on('drain', cb) | | x events, and their | .on('unpipe', cb) | +---------v---------+ x respective callbacks. | .on('error', cb) | | Readable Stream +----+ | .
